name: sickrage
description: SiCKRAGE - Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows
full_description:
This is a Dockerfile setup for SiCKRAGE - https://www.sickrage.ca/ ## Usage ``` docker run -d --name="sickrage" -v /path/to/sickrage/data:/config -v /path/to/downloads:/downloads -v /path/to/tv:/tv -v /path/to/anime:/anime -e TZ=Canada/Pacific -p 8081:8081 sickrage/sickrage:latest ``` ## Parameters * `-p 8081` - the port(s) * `-e TZ=` - to choose timezone * `-v /config` - where sickrage should store config files. * `-v /downloads` - your downloads folder * `-v /tv` - your tv-shows folder * `-v /anime` - your anime-shows folder For shell access whilst the container is running do `docker exec -it sickrage -- sh`. ## Setting up the application Web interface is at :8081, set paths for downloads, tv-shows to match docker mappings via the webui.
To monitor the logs of the container in real-time `docker logs -f sickrage`. ### Image Variants `sickrage:`
These are built from our stable master branch. `sickrage:.dev#`
These are built from our testing develop branch. `sickrage:latest`
These are built to be the latest release from our stable master branch. `sickrage:develop`
These are built to be the latest release from our testing develop branch. ### Arch Types `arm32v7`
These are built for ARM 32-Bit devices. `arm64v8`
These are built for ARM 64-Bit devices.
